name: Pointless Harvest
description:
As the greatest farmer of the country, you must work hard.
Take your tractor to the fields to earn lots of Golars.

Invest in new fields, tractors and chickens!
How much Golars can you make in 14 days?

This game was made for Ludum Dare 52.
Below is the link to our contribution page.
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/52/$313296

Special thanks to Kevin for coming up with the awesome name for this game!
